reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Scaling HIV Interventions among Key Affected Populations in Afghanistan

description.narrative: Afghanistan - HIV - United Nations Development Programme - UNDP Afghanistan. This program has the following goals: The goal of the NSP IV is to halt new HIV, STI & Hepatitis infections and improve the health and quality of life of people living with and affected by HIV, STIs, and Hepatitis in Afghanistan over the next five years.. The objectives of this program are: To focus strategically on prevention services for HIV and other infections for key populations (PWID, MHRB, WHRB and prisoners). To increase the coverage and quality of opiod substitution therapy for people who inject drugs by 2023. To increase the coverage and quality of antiretroviral therapy services for people living with HIV by 2023. To strengthen capacity and systems to generate strategic information on HIV, STIs and Hepatitis through biological and behavior surveillance, surveys and research for evidence-based response to the HIV, STIs and Hepatitis epidemic. To improve the enabling environment to address enhanced coordination, human rights, positive legal environment, strengthened community systems, increased domestic funding, reduced stigma and discrimination, to address the needs and rights of key populations affected by HIV, STIs and Hepatitis

description.narrative: Living support to client/ target population (LSCTP)

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for AFG-H-UNDP
Percentage of health facilities dispensing antiretroviral therapy that experienced a stock-out of at least one required antiretroviral drug in the last 12 month
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of individuals receiving Opioid Substitution Therapy who received treatment for at least 6 months
Percentage of HIV-positive pregnant women who received antiretrovirals to reduce the risk of mother-to-child transmission
Percentage of TB patients who had an HIV test result recorded in the TB register
Percentage of HIV-positive patients who were screened for TB in HIV care or treatment settings
Number of needles and syringes distributed per person who injects drugs per year by needle and syringe programs
Percentage of other vulnerable populations reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART, who have a suppressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Number of people in prisons and other closed settings reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
KP- Other 1: Percentage of people in prisons and other closed settings reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of adults and children that initiated ART, with an undetectable viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive registered TB patients given anti-retroviral therapy during TB treatment
Number of people in prisons or other closed settings that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
GP-other 1: Number of women and men aged 15+ who received an HIV test and know their results in Voluntary Counselling and Testing centres (VCTs)
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
KP- Other 2: Percentage of people in prisons and other closed settings that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people living with HIV that initiated ART with a CD4 count of <200 cells/mm³
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Impact indicator for AFG-H-UNDP
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of other vulnerable populations (specify) who are living with HIV
HIV I-other 2: Percentage of WHRB who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
HIV I-other 1: Percentage of MHRB who are living with HIV
HIV I-other1: Percentage of people in prisons and other closed settings who are living with HIV
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for AFG-H-UNDP
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting condom use at last sex
HIV O-other1: Percentage of PWID who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
